name: Golf Gardens
description:
Golf Gardens is a simple minigolf game featuring randomly generated courses.  Move the ball to the hole to earn a point before the timer runs out - see how many you can get!

Controls (All keyboard + mouse)

- Click + drag: Move ball
- R: Randomize course
- Space: Randomize colors only
- W/S: Zoom camera
- A/D: Orbit camera around ball

Courses are generated using the Wave Function Collapse algorithm, and color palettes follow a split-complementary scheme.  Built in Unity.

(Please note that there is always a path from the start to the end, but not all parts of the course can reach the main path.  We'll just call that a "hazard" for now.)

-------------------------------------------

Developers
Paloma González Gálvez, Mari Endo, Matt Johannesen

Inspiration
- "Superpositions, Sudoku, the Wave Function Collapse algorithm." by Martin Donald
- "Wave" WFC algorithm demo by Oskar Stålberg

Assets
- Logo by Paloma González Gálvez
- Minigolf Kit by Kenney
